alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:29AM CDT until July 07 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR WESTERN LIPSCOMB AND OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 428 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Perryton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Booker, Wolf Creek Park and Farnsworth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
